entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: WNW 46 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
